title: Hoppin' mad [Widescreen]
creator_credit: David McKay Design and David McKay
brief_description: Cold Chisel’s “Cheap wine” sing along by two travelling German tourists is rudely interrupted when their car hits a kangaroo. Not wanting to waste a photo opportunity with one of Australia’s most famous native animals, Rainer and Dirk take time out to pose with “Skippy”, with surprising results. In German with English subtitles.
